name: Grim Tales Server Mod
description:
Server Mod for Grim Tales server.
-Balances all weapons and armor to DLC levels, removes special effects.
-Pacifies pets and thralls.
-Adds recipes for EE/DMT items.
-Adds some new items.
-Adds thrall recipes to players.
changeNote:
-Balanced new claw weapons
-Balanced new black ice weapons
-Adjusted damage on mauls that were out of the line, increased maul arpens to new values, decreased stamina costs to new funcom values
-Decreased spear stamina costs to new funcom values
author: Grim Tales
